SEARCH
Package ru.ifmo.se.utils.IOManagers

Interface IOManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseIOManager, FileIOManager
public interface IOManager
Interface for input/output operations in the application. Implementations of this interface handle reading input from a source and writing output to a destination.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    String
    readLine(String prompt)
    Reads a line of text from the input source with the specified prompt.
    void
    write(String data)
    Writes the specified data to the output destination.
    void
    writeln(String data)
    Writes the specified data to the output destination, followed by a line separator.

  • Method Details

    • write

      void write(String data) throws IOException
      Writes the specified data to the output destination.
      Parameters:
      data - the data to write
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs

    • readLine

      String readLine(String prompt) throws IOException
      Reads a line of text from the input source with the specified prompt.
      Parameters:
      prompt - the prompt to display before reading
      Returns:
      the line read from the input source, or null if the end of the input has been reached
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs

    • writeln

      void writeln(String data) throws IOException
      Writes the specified data to the output destination, followed by a line separator.
      Parameters:
      data - the data to write
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs
